```html
            fill="#444"
          />
        </svg>
      </div>
    </footer>
  </div>
  <div class="portrait"></div>
</div>
```

```css
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Lobster&display=swap');

  --primary: #ff4646;
}

  font-family: 'Proxima Nova', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto,

}
```
